sen.j: 日鎮（にっちん、文明_(日本)元年（1469年） - 大永7年6月24日_(旧暦)）は、大石寺第12世法主。
sen.e: Nicchin (1469 to June 24, 1527 (old lunar calendar)) was the 12th head priest of Taiseki-ji Temple.

sen.j: 俗に稚児貫首と称される。
sen.e: He was commonly called chigo kanshu (chief priest).
sen.cmt: 稚児貫首はchigo kanshuとしました。
sen.e: He was commonly called Chigo Kanshu (chief priest at very young age).

sen.j: 出生は皇室の出身とされ、現今の黒門（黒木の門）は、この法主の時代に完成。
sen.e: It is said that he was born in an imperial family and the remaining Kuro-mon gate (black wooden gate) was completed in the days of this head priest.
It is said that he was born in an imperial family and the Kuro-mon gate (black wooden gate) that still exists today was completed in the days of this head priest.
sen.cmt: 「現今の」の訳を修正しました。
sen.e: It is said that he was born in an imperial family and the Kuro-mon gate (black wooden gate) that still exists today was completed in the days of this head priest.

sen.j: 黒木の門は、皇室ゆかりの門である。
sen.e: The black wooden gate is a gate in connection with the imperial family.

sen.j: 1522年（大永2年）9月17日、大石寺御影堂・総門等を建立し結構を整う。
sen.e: He built the Goei-do Hall, the main gate, etc. of Taiseki-ji Temple and prepared for lectures on September 17, 1522.
sen.cmt: 結構を整うはprepared for lecturesと訳しました。
